DOC.brief_summary: This study determine diurnal variation tear meniscus tear osmolarity normal subject dry eye patient .
DOC.brief_title: Diurnal Variation Tear Meniscus Tear Osmolarity
DOC.detailed_description: This study determine diurnal variation tear meniscus use OCT tear osmolarity use Tearlab 's osmolarity system normal subject dry eye patient .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion 1 . Is least 18 year old full legal capacity volunteer ; 2 . Has read sign IRB Informed Consent Document ; 3 . Is willing able follow participant instruction ; 4 . Has clear cornea ; 5 . Has 20/100 uncorrected visual acuity well ; 6 . Is hard ( rigid gas permeable ) contact lens wearer within last year ; 7 . Was soft contact lens wearer , stop wear least 1 week ago ; 8 . Has dry eye accord study definition DES ( study subject ) . Exclusion criteria 1 . Has systemic disease affect ocular health except Sjögren 's syndrome ; 2 . Is use systemic topical medication affect ocular health except artificial tear ; 3 . Has active ocular disease DES , meibomian gland disease Sjögren 's syndrome 4 . Has clinically significant lid conjunctival abnormality , neovascularization , corneal scar corneal opacity ; 5 . Has limbal bulbar injection corneal stain clinically significant , due DES ; 6 . Has wear rigid gas permeable lens within 1 year ; 7 . Has surgery eye injury within 6 month .
